text: beshak phiraun ne (misr kee) sarazameen mein bahut sar uthaaya tha aur usane vahaan ke rahane vaalon ko kaee giroh kar diya tha unamen se ek giroh (banee isarail) ko aajiz kar rakha th ki unake beton ko zabaah karava deta tha aur unakee auraton (betiyon) ko zinda chhod deta tha beshak vah bhee mufasidon mein tha
